----- Data -----
xxx: name of the encrypted file (TomTom DRM v1 only? -> v2 start with TTDRM and contain also the certificate)

CID: Hardware ID of the SD card

MUID: Machine unique ID

DUID: Device unique ID (derivative of MUID)


----- files -----
xxx.dct / xxx.mct:
	Nck: Index of public key to decrypt Cx
	4 bytes
	Cx: Encrypted certificate - encrypted with RSA PKCS#1v1.5 - public decrypt with (Nc[Nck],E) to get the certificate C
	file length -4 bytes

libttn.so:
	Nc: Table of all public modulos possible for the message Cx
	32*128 bytes
	Ns: Table of all public modulos possible for the file signature Sx
	32*128 bytes
	E: Public exponent for RSA - 2^16+1
	4 bytes
	IV: Initialisation vector for the blowfish decoding algorithm - "tomtomiv"
	8 bytes

xxx:
	Dx: Crypted data - encrypted with Blowfish CFB - decrypt with IV and META by block of 1024 bytes to get the data D
	length of xxx -Sxs -4*(nRNck+8) bytes
	Hfn: MD5 hash of xxx filename
	16 bytes
	u2: u1<=u2
	4bytes
	RNck: list of revoked Nck for xxx file only
	4*nRNck bytes
	nRNck: number of revoked Nck
	4bytes
	Nsk: Index of public key to decrypt Sx
	4bytes
	Sx: encrypted file content signature - encrypted with RSA PKCS#1v2.0/OAEP - public decrypt with (Ns[Nsk],E) to get the signature S
	Sxs bytes
	Sxs: Size of Sx - 128
	4 bytes


----- Encrypted content -----
C:
	Ct: Certificate type
	4 bytes
	Mxor: XORed meta code
	16 bytes
	Hm: meta code MD5 hash
	16 bytes
	u1: u1<=u2
	4 bytes
	nRNk: number (?) of revoked Nck/Nsk (infinite loop revoking the first RNk in my libttn.so ???)
	4bytes
	RNk: list (?) of revoked Nck/Nsk if nRnk!=0 for the entire system (?)
	?*4 bytes

S:
	Hc: MD5 hash of the content of xxx up to Nsk
	16 bytes

D:
	Data


----- Meta code -----
ID: Ct&2 ? MUID : (Ct&4 ? CID : DUID)

META: MD5(xxx filename+ID)^Mxor


----- Tables -----
Nc table:
	8eb7e533ae188f853a949da949c1ce953f0d6db8777b82ee5f7e5b4349e82ceddff9a029eb522c0d117094d5e65d591cecc87a5b34220b0385e1c8fd67f179b3300c1beaf7fc60728446dbc734e56bdc10a2d15b8fb92606c5d33cf9adac31a9c5fd54b7bb77ab8b4fb3552bc854824f1303847adffcb25a94a5cd7e941cbc63
